transcripts.text: I think about it all the time.  What bills are coming in?  How will we pay for it?  I want to be able to give my daughters a great childhood without worrying about health care expenses.  I have a life-threatening, incurable kidney disease.  What can we afford?  What do we do, you know, if I'm on dialysis and I can't work?  The president's trying to take away my coverage because of my pre-existing condition.  What's more valuable, people or profits?
